articles.author: Nathan Bomey
articles.title: Americans are now betting on winter storm totals on Polymarket and Kalshi - Axios
articles.description: A winter storm is expected to disrupt the U.S. this weekend — and some people could make a few extra bucks.
articles.content:
The big picture: With a huge swath of America set to get pummeled by snow and ice, some people are studying weather models or simply putting a finger to the wind in hopes of pocketing some cash.
